summary: Discovered and fixed the true root cause of module resolution failures. The issue was an over-aggressive .vercelignore file that was excluding essential build configuration files (tsconfig.json, tailwind.config.js, postcss.config.mjs) that Next.js requires during the build process to properly resolve @/ path aliases and compile CSS. Uncommented these critical config files from .vercelignore and deployed as commit 704f7c5.
current_status: FINAL DEPLOYMENT FIX IMPLEMENTED: All systematic deployment issues resolved: 1) Serverless function size optimized, 2) Import/export syntax corrected, 3) Essential build configs now included. The deployment should now succeed as Next.js can properly resolve all module paths and compile assets.
